This article is about the original HoriServer. For its spiritual successor, see HoriServer (2).

HoriServer

HoriServerÂ¹ is a server on the Discord alternative Revolt. It was created on 3 February 2025 as a result of and was primarily active during Horibyteâ€™s prolonged Discord break throughout February 2025.

A private server, its main purpose is to serve as a fallback limited space with Horibyte and their friends. Horibyte has stated that they joined Revolt (and thus create the server) to not â€œbe alone for the 3rd time in my [Horibyteâ€™s] lifeâ€. A wave of several few people have joined Revolt for HoriServer in the immediate aftermath of Horibyte departing Discord.

As of May 2025, the server still exists and remains fully open, but has remained mostly inactive after Horibyteâ€™s comeback to Discord. At the moment it is unlikely the server will ever be used again due to Horibyteâ€™s changing opinion on the Revolt platform itself.

At its peak in February, the Revolt server ran alongside the StuffyXP Hangout Discord server, which continued to be ran separately by Clyron, next in the serverâ€™s management after Horibyte. Following the sunsetting of the StuffyXP channels, a successor Discord server was created, bearing the name HoriServer (2), considered to be the spiritual successor to â€œHoriServerâ€ on Revolt.

The public server structure consists of:

  • The Important category
    • Contains the channels â€œRulesâ€, â€œAnnouncementsâ€ and â€œJoins & Co.â€
  • The Main category
    • Contains the general chat channel, as well as the â€œPhotos & Videosâ€ and â€œGamingâ€ channels, along with a starboard
  • The Silly category
    • Contains various meme, HoriCulture or chain channels
